channel.title: [317] FizzerX PvP
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Ja0lzBz.png[/img]
[b]Hello, Mopar. I want to thank each and every one of you who have clicked on this thread. I hope that you follow this thread to see my newest updates to FizzerX PvP. This was originally going to be an Eco server, but I decided to make it a Spawn PvP server.[/b] [/center]
I will be updating this topic very often. Feedback is always appreciated. [B][SIZE=5] [DEVELOPMENT LOG][/SIZE][/B] - Shilo Village rocks give random gems when you mine them. - All skills require the correct items. Example: Woodcutting requires an axe, mining requires a pickaxe, etc - Woodcutting works perfect, the trees give the correct logs. - Fishing spots give the correct fish. - Use a tinderbox on logs to make a fire. - Use raw fish on a stove to cook it. - Recreated my own Training zones. - New home! - Random items will apear in certain spots. - Added forced NPC texts. - NPC's have dialogue. - Thieving from stalls give money/items, depends on what kind of stall it is. - Pickpocketing works on some NPC's. - Added agility obstacles. - Smithing works 100% with the correct interfaces. - Fixed all the 2h swords. - Recreated the vengeance system. - Recreated the NPC strength. - Created custom quests. - Fixed the ::yell command, and cleaned it up. - Created yell titles. - Created Donator Status. - Fixed all the item dupes. -[B] Doors.cfg[/B] - Fixed the lag. - Created minigames. - Recreated old minigames. - Recreated Dialogue Handler. - Fixed non wild areas. - Fixed the config when right clicking on a player. - Updated max money from 999M to 2147M. - Updated shops. - Updated item stats. - Created Anti-SYI. - Cleaned up a bunch of unneeded coding. - Created 2 custom maps. - Created custom interfaces. - Imported custom maps and interfaces. - Removed a few interfaces that won't be needed. - Fixed Firemaking, added correct GFX. - Added the old music. - Updated the Quest Tab. - Added new items. - Updated gameframe. - Added new NPC's. - Created Clanchat. - Created Staff Zone, and Donator Zone. - Added PK Shop. - Added Donator Shop. - 100% combat. - 100% PKing with working specs. - Recreated Veng. - Created Achievments. - Created new bank interfaces. - Client has the option to save your username and password. - Spawn items from the Quest Tab. -- MORE COMING SOON --
MEDIA:
[spoiler]Spawn items from the quest tab [img]http://i.imgur.com/P1jzGR9.png[/img]
NEW GAMEFRAME: [img]http://i.imgur.com/MBT40Oe.png[/img]
Custom items, and interface! [img]http://i.imgur.com/0Gxg5oo.png[/img]
Quest Tab shows the Staff List and Quests! [img]http://i.imgur.com/2Qs14Dx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jria08Z.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eaettFE.png[/img]
Fishing! [img]http://i.imgur.com/8LetXjL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Vdz5ZJT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ILZ23a2.png[/img]
Updated Quest Tab! [img]http://i.imgur.com/0sHMFZo.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IOX9uaN.png[/img] Credits: (RuneServer usernames) - fizzerxdev aka Mod Cody (me) - Mod Allstar (for the original source) - Koddama (for the GFx banner) - Christian_ (Temporary Client Developer)

item.title: [317] FizzerX PvP
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

[center]

Hello, Mopar. I want to thank each and every one of you who have clicked on this thread. I hope that you follow this thread to see my newest updates to FizzerX PvP. This was originally going to be an Eco server, but I decided to make it a Spawn PvP server.
[/center]

I will be updating this topic very often. Feedback is always appreciated.
[SIZE=5]
[DEVELOPMENT LOG][/SIZE]

  • Shilo Village rocks give random gems when you mine them.
  • All skills require the correct items. Example: Woodcutting requires an axe, mining requires a pickaxe, etc
  • Woodcutting works perfect, the trees give the correct logs.
  • Fishing spots give the correct fish.
  • Use a tinderbox on logs to make a fire.
  • Use raw fish on a stove to cook it.
  • Recreated my own Training zones.
  • New home!
  • Random items will apear in certain spots.
  • Added forced NPC texts.
  • NPC’s have dialogue.
  • Thieving from stalls give money/items, depends on what kind of stall it is.
  • Pickpocketing works on some NPC’s.
  • Added agility obstacles.
  • Smithing works 100% with the correct interfaces.
  • Fixed all the 2h swords.
  • Recreated the vengeance system.
  • Recreated the NPC strength.
  • Created custom quests.
  • Fixed the ::yell command, and cleaned it up.
  • Created yell titles.
  • Created Donator Status.
  • Fixed all the item dupes.
    - Doors.cfg
  • Fixed the lag.
  • Created minigames.
  • Recreated old minigames.
  • Recreated Dialogue Handler.
  • Fixed non wild areas.
  • Fixed the config when right clicking on a player.
  • Updated max money from 999M to 2147M.
  • Updated shops.
  • Updated item stats.
  • Created Anti-SYI.
  • Cleaned up a bunch of unneeded coding.
  • Created 2 custom maps.
  • Created custom interfaces.
  • Imported custom maps and interfaces.
  • Removed a few interfaces that won’t be needed.
  • Fixed Firemaking, added correct GFX.
  • Added the old music.
  • Updated the Quest Tab.
  • Added new items.
  • Updated gameframe.
  • Added new NPC’s.
  • Created Clanchat.
  • Created Staff Zone, and Donator Zone.
  • Added PK Shop.
  • Added Donator Shop.
  • 100% combat.
  • 100% PKing with working specs.
  • Recreated Veng.
  • Created Achievments.
  • Created new bank interfaces.
  • Client has the option to save your username and password.
  • Spawn items from the Quest Tab.
    – MORE COMING SOON –

MEDIA:

[spoiler]Spawn items from the quest tab

P1jzGR9.png758×498

NEW GAMEFRAME:
